option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --random-seed 12345 --agent rlai.policy_gradient.ParameterizedMdpAgent --gamma 0.98 --environment cart_pole.environment.CartPole --T 3000 --limit-to-limit-mm 914.0 --soft-limit-standoff-mm 100.0 --cart-width-mm 45.0 --motor-pwm-channel 0 --motor-pwm-direction-pin CkPin.GPIO21 --motor-negative-speed-is-right --cart-rotary-encoder-phase-a-pin CkPin.GPIO22 --cart-rotary-encoder-phase-b-pin CkPin.GPIO26 --pole-rotary-encoder-phase-a-pin CkPin.GPIO17 --pole-rotary-encoder-phase-b-pin CkPin.GPIO27 --left-limit-switch-input-pin CkPin.GPIO20 --right-limit-switch-input-pin CkPin.GPIO16 --timesteps-per-second 75.0 --train-function rlai.policy_gradient.monte_carlo.reinforce.improve --num-episodes 100 --v-S rlai.state_value.function_approximation.ApproximateStateValueEstimator --feature-extractor cart_pole.feature_extraction.CartPoleBaselineFeatureExtractor --function-approximation-model rlai.models.sklearn.SKLearnSGD --loss squared_error --sgd-alpha 0.0 --learning-rate constant --eta0 0.001 --policy rlai.policy_gradient.policies.continuous_action.ContinuousActionBetaDistributionPolicy --policy-feature-extractor cart_pole.feature_extraction.CartPolePolicyFeatureExtractor --alpha 0.001 --update-upon-every-visit True --save-agent-path ~/Desktop/cart_pole_agent.pickle --checkpoint-path ~/Desktop/cartpole_checkpoints/checkpoint.pickle --num-episodes-per-checkpoint 1 --log DEBUG
